altername_name: MIF II: Made in France II
name: Made in France II
overview: Made in France II is a Breakout/Arkanois clone for the Commodore 64. it was developed by Jeff Minter and published in The Zzap! Sampler (Zzap! 64 06/1987). The game is a simple two player Breakout clone where the bricks are in the centre and behind each player. The player's bats are at the upper and lower half of the screen. If a player lets the ball leave the screen, the round is lost.
